code:
import JobOffer from"../../images/job-post-3.svg";import JobOfferTitle1 from"../../images/jobOfferTitle1.svg";export default[{headerTitleWithImgTitle:"CAREER OPPORTUNITIES",headerTitleWithImgSubtitle:"Startup Advisor",withHeaderTitleWithImg:true,headerTitleWithImgURL:JobOffer},{title:"Role Overview"},{subtitle:"As a Startup Advisor, your top priority will be to build strong and trusted relationships with a diverse "+"range of founders and startups within the Moken Ecosystem."},{description:[{title:"As an advisor, you are someone who seeks problems "+"and defines solutions. You will be responsible for proactively supporting founders on an on-demand advisory "+"basis through a wide range of scenarios within your specialized area of expertise.",containerStyles:{marginBottom:25}},{title:"Our advisors are individuals with deep industry, investment, or entrepreneurial experience. They work with "+"our startups and founders on a demand or need basis, with the expectation of intensive knowledge sharing "+"and guidance. Advisors are one aspect which make Moken unique and are a large reason behind the success of "+"many of our clients, founders, and startups.
"}]},{title:"Some of the Advisory Expertise Areas we are actively searching for..."},{description:[{title:"General Entrepreneurship",withDash:true},{title:"Traditional Marketing & Advertising",withDash:true},{title:"Client & User Acquisition",withDash:true},{title:"Founder Branding & Personal Development",withDash:true},{title:"Digital Product Development & Design",withDash:true},{title:"Growth Hacking & Creative Tactics",withDash:true},{title:"Culture, Diversity & Accessibility",withDash:true},{title:"Team Management, Success, & Human Resources",withDash:true},{title:"Investment Funding & Capital Raising",withDash:true},{title:"Corporate Finance, Accounting & Financial Modeling",withDash:true},{title:"Legal & Regulatory",withDash:true},{title:"RevOps, Strategy & Business Modeling",withDash:true}]},{title:"How it Works"},{description:[{title:"Our Startup Advisor positions are an on-demand, contract position based on your availability, rate, and area of expertise. Through our automated platform, startups and founders have the ability to book and schedule advisory sessions with you and other advisors based on availability provided within your designated calendar. Bookings will be directly scheduled within your connected calendar along with any relevant session notes and information straight from the client to ensure you’re well informed at all times. Payments by founders and startups are made at the time of booking and are paid out to advisors on a monthly basis."}]},{title:"Your Role"},{description:[{title:"Instead of simply solving problems and answering basic queries, our advisors counter-question founders, provoke innovative thinking, and integratively work to drive out-of-the-box thoughts;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll help founders to solve their most complex issues through your diverse experience and innovation driven expertise;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll manage assumptions and guide from your own real life experiences with an open mind at all times;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll respect the founder's ideas and ventures even though they may vary from your own;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll lead and advise with knowledge while understanding that there often may be no right or wrong answer that could support the founder and their goals;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll attend in-person (Covid permitting) and online meetings with founders based on your schedule, preferences, and goals;",withDash:true},{title:"You may review plans, draft memos, make introductions, recommendations, and generally advise on matters within your expertise area;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll be honest and competent in your leadership and advise with passion;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll understand each founder is often driven by more than just “making money” and
"+"will be expected to keep this in mind as you advise on various aspects of the
"+"business;",withDash:true},{title:"You will be self supervised, work out of the comfort of your own space, and work as
"+"many or as few hours as necessary to accomplish your objectives;",withDash:true},{title:"You will also be free to pursue other advisorships, engagements (subject to conflict
"+"avoidance provisions)",withDash:true}]},{title:"As a human"},{description:[{title:"You’ll have 2-4 years industry experience in a specific field of expertise;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll be familiar with startup functionality and the tumultuous day to day operations
"+"and well as the challenges that go along with it;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll boast the ability to work with a diverse range of startups and founders;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re reliable and have the time management skills to attend and participate
"+"actively in scheduled consulting and advisory meetings.",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll have ample communication skills to communicate your experiences and
"+"knowledge;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll be excited about incorporating your ideas into the diverse vision of the future
"+"our founders and startups have;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll be uber passionate about your work and take pride in it;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll be ready to motivate and inspire founders holistically;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll have good networking skills to help you stay connected with the right people
"+"and resources;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re hardworking and motivated;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re a natural-born connector and thrive on building community through
"+"relationships and knowledge sharing;",withDash:true},{title:"You enjoy independent work, but also thrive in a team environment when the
"+"advisory requires it;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re passionate about creating an impact and strive for success in anything you
"+"do;",withDash:true},{title:"You have a high degree of accountability and understand the importance of leading
"+"with honesty and integrity;",withDash:true},{title:"You communicate effectively and voice your opinions when you truly believe in
"+"something but are always looking and listening to alternative opinions, methods, and
"+"suggestions from those around you;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re confident in yourself but not afraid to ask questions or for clarification when
"+"necessary;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re not afraid to dive into new projects and never shy away from the unknown;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re up for a challenge and are willing to learn as you go;",withDash:true},{title:"You know that despite vast experience you may not know everything, but you’re
"+"determined to figure it out along the way;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll have a proven track record within the world of business and more specifically
"+"working with startups;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re a fast learner and are comfortable working with founders who have new and
"+"innovative ideas;",withDash:true},{title:"You have a strong comfort level in advising and mentoring but know that your
"+"experience is just a baseline and not necessarily the path that the founder will follow;",withDash:true},{title:"Your attention to detail is an area of strength in which you pride yourself on;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re a people person and know how to navigate your way through a conversation,
"+"even if it may at times be completely out of your comfort zone;",withDash:true},{title:"You have a strong interest in the entrepreneurship and startup industries;",withDash:true},{title:"You understand that founders may not always have an answer for you because of
"+"their stage, but you’re okay helping them figure it out as they go;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re driven by providing valuable feedback that aids in creating something you can
"+"be proud of;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re focused and heavily value achieving success as a team;",withDash:true},{title:"Know what you know, and know what you don't.",withDash:true}]},{title:"Opportunities & Added Value,"},{description:[{title:"In this role, you will gain the opportunity to establish long term relationships with growing companies globally while shaping the future of Moken and startups around the world.
"}]},{withTitleContainerWithImg:true,titleContainerWithImgTitle:"TO APPLY",titleContainerWithImgDescription:[{title:"For this position, although experience is key, we do not require you to have been an advisor or consultant before, simply expertise in a specific industry topic is a necessity. Therefore, we encourage all those who believe they have what it takes to be successful and are up for the challenge to apply."},{title:"ONLY APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED THROUGH THE FOLLOWING METHOD WILL BE REVIEWED AND CONSIDERED"},{title:"To submit an application, please email careers@mokenstartups.com with the subject line “​Chicken Wing, Chicken Wing, Hot Dog & Bologne ​” with your resume, an introductory 30-second video or cover letter, and your portfolio or a case study of past work (if applicable)."}],titleContainerWithImgImageURL:JobOfferTitle1},{colorBlock:'black',colorSubtitle:'SEE OPPORTUNITIES',colorTitle:'Not the right position? Check out our other opportunities.',colorBlockProps:{containerStyles:{marginBottom:114}}},{withForm:true}];
